quotes.text: Focus is the gateway to thinking clearly, feeling deeply, and living fully.
quotes.author: Cal Newport

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of commitment to excellence.
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.text: One hour of focused work is worth more than ten hours of distracted effort.
quotes.author: Cal Newport

quotes.text: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: It's not always that we need to do more but rather that we need to focus on less.
quotes.author: Nathan W. Morris

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.author: David Goggins

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Ben Francia

quotes.text: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quotes.text: Little things make big days.
quotes.author: Isabel Marant

quotes.text: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hensel

quotes.text: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: The struggle you're in today is developing the strength you need tomorrow.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.text: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
quotes.author: Karen Lamb

quotes.text: Success is what happens after you have survived all your mistakes.
quotes.author: Anora Lee

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: If you're not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Take the risk or lose the chance.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Do what you can with all you have, wherever you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Self-trust is the first secret of success.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.text: It's not what we have in life but who we have in our life that matters.
quotes.author: J.M. Laurence

quotes.text: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.text: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.text: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on them.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.text: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
quotes.author: Jamie Paolinetti

quotes.text: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.'
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: I didn't fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.text: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.text: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, but whether you let it harden or shame you.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.text: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.text: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: The difference between successful people and very successful people is that very successful people say no to almost everything.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: The number one reason people fail in life is because they listen to their friends, family, and neighbors.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: The reason most people never reach their goals is that they don't define them, or ever seriously consider them as believable or achievable.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: In my experience, there is only one motivation, and that is desire. No reasons or principle contain it or stand against it.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.text: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everybody.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.text: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
quotes.author: Bruce Feirstein

quotes.text: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember, the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
quotes.author: Estée Lauder

quotes.text: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.text: There is no substitute for hard work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Small daily improvements over time lead to stunning results.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.text: Know thyself.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: I know that I know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: To find yourself, think for yourself.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: He who is not a good servant will not be a good master.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, and intelligent execution.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: He who has overcome his fears will truly be free.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: First, have a definite, clear practical ideal; a goal, an objective. Second, have the necessary means to achieve your ends; wisdom, money, materials, and methods. Third, adjust all your means to that end.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Difficulties are things that show a person what they are.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: No man is free who is not master of himself.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: If it is not right, do not do it; if it is not true, do not say it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: The obstacle is the way.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: He who fears death will never do anything worth of a man who is alive.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare; it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: As long as you live, keep learning how to live.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: The privilege of a lifetime is to become who you truly are.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Until you make the unconscious conscious, it will direct your life and you will call it fate.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Nothing will work unless you do.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: The time is always right to do what is right.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: For to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: And still, I rise.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: The three great essentials to achieve anything worthwhile are: Hard work, Stick-to-itiveness, and Common sense.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: What we think, we become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: The only thing that is constant is change.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: Character is destiny.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: Big results require big ambitions.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: I came, I saw, I conquered.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.text: Experience is the teacher of all things.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.text: It is better to create than to learn! Creating is the essence of life.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.text: Cowards die many times before their deaths; the valiant never taste of death but once.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.text: The die is cast.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.text: As a man thinketh in his heart, so is he.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.text: A good name is rather to be chosen than great riches.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.text: Pride goes before destruction, and a haughty spirit before a fall.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.text: Where there is no vision, the people perish.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.text: A friend loves at all times.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.text: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: There are no facts, only interpretations.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Courage is knowing what not to fear.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Ignorance, the root and stem of every evil.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: The measure of a man is what he does with power.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Opinion is the medium between knowledge and ignorance.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Nothing in the world is worth having or worth doing unless it means effort, pain, difficulty.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only man who never makes a mistake is the man who never does anything.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Work is the greatest thing in the world, so we should always save some of it for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.text: Concentration is the secret of strength.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The ability to concentrate and to use your time well is everything if you want to succeed in business—or almost anywhere else.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.text: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.text: Lost time is never found again.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff life is made of.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: You may delay, but time will not.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Time is the scarcest resource and unless it is managed nothing else can be managed.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: The key is in not spending time, but in investing it.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.text: Until we can manage time, we can manage nothing else.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: The common man is not concerned about the passage of time, the man of talent is driven by it.
quotes.author: Schopenhauer

quotes.text: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.text: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
quotes.author: Michael Altshuler

quotes.text: Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: You don't need more time, you just need to decide.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.text: Work expands so as to fill the time available for its completion.
quotes.author: C. Northcote Parkinson

quotes.text: The shorter way to do many things is to only do one thing at a time.
quotes.author: Mozart

quotes.text: To think too long about doing a thing often becomes its undoing.
quotes.author: Eva Young

quotes.text: Someday is not a day of the week.
quotes.author: Janet Daily

quotes.text: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: The true method of knowledge is experiment.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: In absence of clearly defined goals, we become strangely loyal to performing daily acts of trivia.
quotes.author: Robert Heinlein

quotes.text: Don't confuse activity with productivity.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Efficiency is doing things right; effectiveness is doing the right things.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: What gets measured gets managed.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Things which matter most must never be at the mercy of things which matter least.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: The least productive people are usually the ones who are most in favor of holding meetings.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.text: Reduce the complexity of life by eliminating the needless wants of life, and the labors of life reduce themselves.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.text: A plan is what, a schedule is when. It takes both a plan and a schedule to get things done.
quotes.author: Peter Turla

quotes.text: One of the very worst uses of time is to do something very well that need not be done at all.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Think of many things; do one.
quotes.author: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started. The secret of getting started is breaking your complex overwhelming tasks into small manageable tasks.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Action expresses priorities.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Time management is life management.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.text: One always has time enough, if one will apply it well.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: The great dividing line between success and failure can be expressed in five words: 'I did not have time.'
quotes.author: Franklin Field

quotes.text: Guard well your spare moments. They are like uncut diamonds.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Absorb what is useful, discard what is not, add what is uniquely your own.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: You will never find time for anything. If you want time you must make it.
quotes.author: Charles Buxton

quotes.text: Most people overestimate what they can do in one year and underestimate what they can do in ten years.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.text: If you don't pay appropriate attention to what has your attention, it will take more of your attention than it deserves.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: Ordinary people think merely of spending time, great people think of using it.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: The more you concentrate, the more you can achieve in a short period of time.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
